properties.name: hephaestus.intelligence-service.url
properties.description: Base URL of the intelligence service

properties.name: hephaestus.mail.sender
properties.description: Email sender address

properties.name: hephaestus.mail.enabled
properties.description: Whether email sending is enabled

properties.name: hephaestus.leaderboard.schedule.cron
properties.description: Cron expression for leaderboard calculation

properties.name: hephaestus.activity.self-review-author-logins
properties.description: List of bot logins whose PRs are excluded from self-review scoring

properties.name: hephaestus.detection.run-automatic-detection-for-all
properties.description: Whether to run automatic detection for all PRs

properties.name: hephaestus.detection.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Whether Langfuse tracing is enabled for detection operations

properties.name: hephaestus.detection.tracing.host
properties.description: Langfuse server host URL

properties.name: hephaestus.detection.tracing.public-key
properties.description: Langfuse public key for authentication

properties.name: hephaestus.detection.tracing.secret-key
properties.description: Langfuse secret key for authentication (use environment variable in production)

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.graphql-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for standard GraphQL operations (default: 30s). Accepts duration format: 30s, 1m, PT30S

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.extended-graphql-timeout
properties.description: Extended timeout for complex GraphQL operations like review comments (default: 60s). Accepts duration format: 60s, 1m, PT60S

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.pagination-throttle
properties.description: Delay between pagination requests to avoid hammering GitHub's API (default: 200ms). Accepts duration format: 200ms, PT0.2S

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.incremental-sync-enabled
properties.description: Whether to use incremental sync based on last sync timestamp

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.cooldown-minutes
properties.description: Minimum minutes between consecutive sync operations

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.nats.enabled
properties.description: Whether NATS JetStream integration is enabled

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.nats.server
properties.description: NATS server URL (e.g., nats://localhost:4222)

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.nats.durable-consumer-name
properties.description: Durable consumer name for JetStream subscriptions (empty for ephemeral)

properties.name: hephaestus.sync.nats.replay-timeframe-days
properties.description: Number of days to replay messages when starting a new consumer

properties.name: hephaestus.posthog.enabled
properties.description: Whether PostHog analytics is enabled

properties.name: hephaestus.posthog.api-host
properties.description: PostHog API host URL

properties.name: hephaestus.posthog.project-id
properties.description: PostHog project ID

properties.name: hephaestus.posthog.personal-api-key
properties.description: PostHog personal API key (use environment variable in production)

properties.name: hephaestus.webapp.url
properties.description: Base URL of the webapp for generating links

properties.name: hephaestus.workspace.init-default
properties.description: Whether to bootstrap a PAT-based workspace on startup (for local development)

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.url
properties.description: Keycloak server URL

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.realm
properties.description: Keycloak realm

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.client-id
properties.description: Keycloak client ID

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.client-secret
properties.description: Keycloak client secret (use environment variable in production)

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.internal-url
properties.description: Internal Keycloak URL for container-to-container access; defaults to public URL

properties.name: hephaestus.keycloak.jwk-set-uri
properties.description: JWK Set URI for token verification; defaults to standard Keycloak endpoint

properties.name: hephaestus.slack.token
properties.description: Slack bot token for workspace notifications (starts with xoxb-)

properties.name: hephaestus.slack.signing-secret
properties.description: Slack signing secret for webhook verification

properties.name: hephaestus.sentry.dsn
properties.description: Sentry DSN for error tracking; leave blank to disable
